nodes.text: Fog creatures or mist creatures were a predatory cephalopoid species native to Kestavel. They lived in the kilometer-deep, fog-covered ravine surrounding The Lucky Twi'lek casino. While they never ventured out of the crevice, they were known to be very dangerous and would consume a falling individual before they reached the bottom.
When the Uhumele took shelter in the fog during the Imperial attack on the casino, Shaylai Veila was cautious to remain outside the ship, fearful that the fog creatures might discover them.
